header_text: You have been liking hanging out with a coworker a lot lately but aren't sure if your romantic feelings are reciprocated. Today, your coworker asks for your number. Your coworker will probably use your phone number to ask you on a date.

elements.Text: Your coworker probably asked for your phone number because...
